basic.description: A course in developing expertise in writing reviews of contemporary world cinema and media arts. The class will meet every other week throughout the Fall and Winter terms. Students' reviews will be posted on a web site.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Reviewing World Cinema and Media Art

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.
